abstract: details of brandon morrow 's contract with cubs revealed .
article: it was reported earlier this week that the cubs signed former dodgers reliever brandon morrow to a multi-year contract , but we were n't entirely sure of the details . well , the cubs announced the news on tuesday , and it looks like a pretty smart move for chicago . here are the details of morrow 's contract : morrow gets 2 years , $ 21 million -- gordon wittenmyer december 13 , 2017 . it 's a great signing by the cubs , and a brutal loss for the dodgers . morrow is becoming one of the best relievers in the game , going 7-0 with a 1.96 era over the last two seasons with the padres and dodgers .

the cubs bullpen faced its struggles last season , as they have had three different closers in the past three seasons . their closer from last season , wade davis , may not return to the team due to the big money he 's expected to get in free agency . cubs manager joe maddon has said that his team should have a solid bullpen at the end of the offseason . joe on relief pitching , `` i just think by the end of this offseason we 're gunna have a really firm bullpen again . '' stick with @nbcschicago for all #mlbwintermeetings coverage this week .

pic . twitter . com/y8obdivzcu -- cubs talk december 12 , 2017 . the cubs are looking to compete for another world series title this upcoming season . fixing what was a problem last season is a good start , even if that means replacing davis with multiple cheaper optio .
